blog.title: Samuel the heart breaker got heart broken
blog.body:
Samuel who use to be a popular heart breaker, has recently been heart broken, by his yoruba hot and businesses mided girl,, after spending close to six(6) million dollars for her, support her business and also sending her abroad to greece who later studied medicine and became a medical nurse. forgetting about Samuel.
now samuel has ventured into forex with the hope of becoming rich and with the intention of getting back at her by marring ira-star.
blog.author: abraham
